samples.question: Danny, what type of music do you enjoy listening to?
samples.transcript: Well, I enjoy listening to Chinese motivational songs and bad love songs. For bad love songs, they captivated me because of their inspiring melodies and lyrics. Often, that often portrays like beautiful pictures of a romantic couple, but ends in an unfortunate way. On the other hand, for Chinese motivational songs, I think that they represent in a, run-sled effort of high school Chinese students trying their best to attend to their dream universities. Thank you. Wow, how interesting.

samples.question: However, one of the works was a trip to Hanoi to meet some of my gaming friends.
samples.transcript: I really hope that I could have more chance to, hang out with them. So I booked this trip as the first opportunities for me to have a chance with them. So we have been playing games for like four years now, but we have not got any chance to meet around. So I have imagined that we, I have imagined that we have, when I book, when I arrive in Hanoi, we will have some amazing experience together, partying to exhaustion and knowing more each other more. Unfortunately, the flight that I booked was delayed due to some disruptions caused by some aerial services. I remember vividly that it was caused by the engines of the planes were broken and also the fuel was exhausted. So this experience, I was very disappointed and frustrated because, when by the time I arrived in Hanoi, it was late and we have to reschedule our meeting to tomorrow. And from the experience it let me feel that it was like a mix of impatience and hopes as according to my plan everything should go well should went well But the plan was interrupted in the last minute So I was kind of feeling bored and feeling down at the at the delayed trips And I hope that the aerial the aerial services should be more improved So it could enhance the use the participant the passive Thank you Danny, that was excellent. I really enjoyed listening to your story there. Well done.

samples.question: What challenges might someone face when living in a foreign country?
samples.transcript: Well, I think there are two biggest challenges Yes We must we must overcome The first challenge is the language barriers Yes So we have to speak to different people Good Maybe we could speak to the local people or international people from another country For example one of my friends when they live abroad they told me that they have met tons of new friends Some of them are native Australian people, but some of the others are British people. So they find it is difficult to understand both of them because of their accents. So, in order to overcome the language barriers, I think they need more time to acquaint their accents in order to understand fluently. Another difficulty that I think we usually encounter is the personal development too. As we have to face many, options that we have to do by our own self. Like we have to find the budgeting accommodations that fits our money, power of money. Also, we have to take care of ourselves. It is very important because there is no one, take care of us. So we have to take care of ourselves. If we do not overcome it, we might feel a little bit isolated. And we might feel in a state of depression. Wow. Yes.

samples.question: However, one thing that I loved when he started, when I asked him, oh, how do you feel?

It psychologically helps you feel more at ease if you have got that out of the way. But if you feel nervous, try to tell them, but end with a positive. samples.question: What do you usually do in your free time?
samples.transcript: Well, since I am only free on Sunday, so, you know, on Sunday, first I will just, you know, decide to be a little bit more idle than usual by staying on the back or maybe a little bit longer than usual. And then, you know, after that, I, you know, after getting dressed, having some breakfast, I will just, continue slouching on my sofa for another half an hour. And then, you know, I will fully focus on what I do, which is, you know, usually on Sunday, I will just focus on my kind of hobby. Usually in the afternoon, I just go around, take some pictures at my university. that is it. Okay.
